bug.title: Chart only displays two digits of the weight axis

paragraph.sentence: What steps will reproduce the problem?
If you enter a weight with 3 digits the labeling on the weight axis will omit the first digit.
E.g.: 104 kg will be displayed as 04 kg.
What version of the product are you using?
